summary: Handsome on the outside and sophisticated on the inside, the Volvo XC40 is a spacious small SUV with smart styling and which is comfortable to drive.
The VW Golf is a great all-rounder that feels consistently good in almost every area. However, it’s dearer than some alternatives and parts of the interior feel low-rent.
The Mercedes GLC is an elegant SUV that looks and feels like a true premium product, but alternatives have fancier tech and are more fun to drive.
The Hyundai i30 N is a great-to-drive, quick and practical family car, but you might hanker after alternatives’ more eye-catching looks and faster straight-line performance.
The Kia Sportage is worth a look if you’re after a practical family SUV with economical engines and a roomy cabin, but alternatives have bigger boots and more safety kit.
The Mercedes A-Class is one of the most upmarket, high-tech small cars on sale, but some more old-fashioned alternatives are more affordable and better to drive.
The SEAT Arona is a safe and roomy small SUV, even if its higher trims look dear and the interior has some cheap-feeling materials.
The Skoda Kodiaq is a big, practical family SUV that’s available with seven seats – although the rearmost two are only big enough for kids.
